definition: ear (of corn or sorghum etc)/bunch (of grapes)/infructescence
abbr. for Guangzhou 廣州|广州[Guang3 zhou1]

sentences.english: Treatments promoted the number of cluster and fruit mature.
sentences.chinese: 處理均能提高葡萄果穗的座果數及促進果實成熟。

sentences.english: The mutating extent of maize ear in M2 generation was greater than in control.
sentences.chinese: M2代果穗各性狀的變異程度大都顯著高於對照。

sentences.english: The leaf number in fruit branch was closely related to fruit size and quality.
sentences.chinese: 枇杷果穗上葉數與果實大小及品質有密切關係。

sentences.english: A and grain crops such as to the forest depths on beitou.
sentences.chinese: 耕一和果穗等人商量去森林深處一探究竟。

sentences.english: Clusters with a variety of colors are not unusual.
sentences.chinese: 果穗上有多種顏色得果實的現象不常見。

sentences.english: Water content of corn stalk was a key factor affecting corn stalk silage.
sentences.chinese: 水分含量是影響去果穗玉米青貯的關鍵限制性因素。

sentences.english: Average cluster, average weight is 150g, very compact cluster.
sentences.chinese: 果穗中小，平均重150g，果穗極緊密。

sentences.english: Average cluster, average weight is 150g, very compact cluster.
sentences.chinese: 果穗中小，平均重150g，果穗極緊密。

definition: axillary bud/bud growing from axil of plant
terminal bud (growing at the tip of a plant)
tiller (stem at the base of grass plants)
scion (branch or bud that is grafted onto rootstock)
